highlighted_features.title: Open Source
highlighted_features.copy: It's in our DNA. The entire MK1 system is Open Source and open for contributions and collaboration.

highlighted_features.title: Fast and Quiet
highlighted_features.copy: By using quality motion components, the Engravinator moves smoothly at up to 10,000 mm/min with 10 micron resolution.

highlighted_features.title: Sturdy
highlighted_features.copy: Extruded 2020 aluminum extrusion frame make for a ridged platform that keeps the engraver square while reducing overall weight.

highlighted_features.title: Safe
highlighted_features.copy: The Engravinator's fully enclosed housing means that while the laser is running, your eyeballs are safe from harm.

highlighted_features.title: Customizable
highlighted_features.copy: With the Engravinator's Open Source design and a community of makers behind it, the Engravinator is super customizable.  From frame clamps to a pen plotter to a custom real-time controller, anything's possible.
